long_description: When does a sock go from something you simply wear on your feet, to something you can't live without? Try the warm, cushioned, quick-drying Burton Emblem socks when you're snowboarding and find out. Blend of acrylic, nylon, polypropylene and spandex draws heat-robbing moisture away from your skin before your feet freeze. Quick-drying polypropylene footbeds resist odors. Elastic supports give your arches and ankles an extra boost so you can ride longer. Comfort bands keep the Burton Emblem socks high in place without constricting calves. Flat-stitched toe seams eliminate chafing and bunching for a better fit inside your boots. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: When does a sock go from something you simply wear on your feet, to something you can't live without? Try the warm, cushioned, quick-drying Burton Emblem socks when you're snowboarding and find out.
